findings.title: Missing SafeMath Library
findings.description: For calculations, it's recommended to use SafeMath library to prevent unsigned integer overflow issue.

findings.title: Token does not follow ERC20 Token Standard - Missing approve function
findings.description: The token standard can be seen here: https://theethereum.wiki/w/index.php/ERC20_Token_Standard Tests created for ERC20 Standard: The `approve` function must be implemented for the Gifto token to be compatible with ERC20.

findings.title: Function createCoin() Should Not Be Allowed to Be Called More Than Once
findings.description: Add a modifier so that createCoin() cannot be called by anybody more than once to ensure the total supply cannot be increased anymore than what is originally minted.
